Texts.Chs: 找到位于^orange;克里昂大使馆^reset;的^orange;法兹^reset;
我发现了一张武器蓝图的碎片。^green;我应该找到其他的碎片，把它们带到克里昂大使馆的军火商那里^white;——他们会知道怎么看完整的蓝图。
Texts.Eng: I found a fragment of a weapon blueprint. ^green;I should find the other pieces and bring them to a weapons dealer in the Creon Embassy ^white;- they'll know how to read the completed blueprint.

Texts.Chs: 你找到了张完美的蓝图！在这里，让我拼凑起来，并把它翻译成一些你可以在工具站制造的东西。我想你会对结果感到满意的！
Texts.Eng: You found quite the blueprint! Here, let me combine it all and translate it into something you can use at a crafting station. I think you'll be happy with the results!
